card.name: Scale of Bravery and Love
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Jack Alcadeias, Dark Gaia
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Slayer ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's cards that costs 4 or less.

card.name: Mukade, Asura (Deathshiraz Star)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard.

card.name: Onsoku Doji (Turbo Ogre)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand, then draw a card. If this creature evolved from a tamaseed, draw another card.

card.name: Stri's Thunder Oni Scroll
card.text: ■ Shinkarise ■ When you put this tamaseed, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card.

card.name: Magan Kongo (N Worl Ogre)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then for each tamaseed put into your graveyard, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random.

card.name: Magan Kongo (N Worl Ogre)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then for each tamaseed put into your graveyard, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random.

card.name: Shiraz's Death Oni Seal
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Shinkarise ■ When you put this tamaseed, put any number of creatures that have total cost 4 or less from your graveyard.

card.name: Shakunetsu's Devil Oni Scroll
card.text: ■ Shinkarise ■ When you put this tamaseed, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Viola's Shadow
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Shinkarise ■ When you put this tamaseed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put a creature from your graveyard that costs less than the destroyed creature.

card.name: Jenny's Shadow
card.text: ■ Shinkarise ■ When you put this tamaseed, discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Kachikomi Nyudo (Batorai Ogre)
card.text: ■ Star Evolution ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, if it evolved from a tamaseed, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.
